trans-unit.source: To implement a custom upgrade acceptor, inherited from this <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class.
trans-unit.target: Å implementere et egendefinert oppgradering acceptor, arvet fra dette <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""> </xref> basisklasse.

trans-unit.source: An example of a stream upgrade is to build a compression stream directly on top of the transport stream.
trans-unit.target: Det er et eksempel på en dataflyt oppgradering å bygge en komprimeringsdataflyten direkte over transportdataflyten.

trans-unit.source: This class is used with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider> to implement a custom stream upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen brukes med <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>implementere en egendefinert dataflyten oppgradering.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator>

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of the upgrade process, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en detaljert beskrivelse av oppgraderingsprosessen, kan du se <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Upgrades the transport stream and returns the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: Oppgraderer transportdataflyten, og returnerer oppgraderte dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to wrap the existing transport stream by providing additional capabilities; for example, a compressing stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan brukes til å utføre eksisterende transportdataflyten ved å gi flere muligheter; for eksempel en Datokomprimerer dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: The stream to be upgraded.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten oppgraderes.

trans-unit.source: Returns the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer oppgraderte dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous version of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade*>.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron versjon av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade*>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade*>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se kommentarer for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream to be upgraded.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten oppgraderes.

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AcceptUpgrade" name="AcceptUpgrade" href=""></xref> call has completed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden kalles når den <xref uid="langword_csharp_AcceptUpgrade" name="AcceptUpgrade" href=""> </xref> kallet er fullført.

trans-unit.source: State information for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AcceptUpgrade" name="AcceptUpgrade" href=""></xref> call.
trans-unit.target: Tilstandsinformasjon for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_AcceptUpgrade" name="AcceptUpgrade" href=""> </xref> kall.

trans-unit.source: Returns a result code that is passed into EndAcceptUpgrade to access the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en resultatkode som er sendt til EndAcceptUpgrade tilgang oppgraderte dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the upgrade requested is supported by this upgrade acceptor.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om oppgraderingen forespurte som støttes av denne oppgraderingen acceptor.

trans-unit.source: The developer can inspect the requested content type and determine whether the resulting upgrade can be performed by this upgrade acceptor.
trans-unit.target: Utvikleren kan undersøkes forespurte innholdstypen og finne ut om resulterende oppgraderingen kan utføres av denne oppgraderingen acceptor.

trans-unit.source: This content type comes from the `GetNextUpgrade` method on the matching upgrade initiator.
trans-unit.target: Innholdstypen kommer fra det `GetNextUpgrade` -metoden på samsvarende oppgradering oppretteren.

trans-unit.source: The type of content to be checked.
trans-unit.target: Typen for innhold som skal kontrolleres.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this kind of upgrade is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis denne typen oppgradering støttes. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous version of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade*>.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron versjon av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade*>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade*>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se kommentarer i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IAsyncResult returned from <xref uid="langword_csharp_BeginAcceptUpgrade" name="BeginAcceptUpgrade" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: IAsyncResult som ble returnert fra <xref uid="langword_csharp_BeginAcceptUpgrade" name="BeginAcceptUpgrade" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer oppgraderte dataflyten.
